name: Spinach Penne with Red Bell peppers, Cherry tomatoes in Chipotle Habanero garlicky Cashew cream sauce. vegan
description: A creamy, filling and vegan pasta dish
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons Chipotle Habanero Hot sauce or to taste (I used Melinda's Chipotle Hot sauce, start with 1 tsp and add more :))
Or 1 chipotle pepper and 1/2+ teaspoon plain habanero sauce or any hot sauce.
1 cup veggies (we uses some sliced up Red and Green bell peppers and cherry tomatoes)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add the oil and heat on medium. Add garlic cloves, stir and cook till they are golden 2-3 minutes, or use roasted garlic cloves and continue to the blend step.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add the oil and heat on medium. Add garlic cloves, stir and cook till they are golden 2-3 minutes, or use roasted garlic cloves and continue to the blend step.

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add powdered cashew, roasted or golden garlic, water, salt, chipotle hot sauce(or chipotle peppers and hot sauce) and blend until smooth.(It will be a thin cream)
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add powdered cashew, roasted or golden garlic, water, salt, chipotle hot sauce(or chipotle peppers and hot sauce) and blend until smooth.(It will be a thin cream)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare pasta according to instructions. Reserve some of the water.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare pasta according to instructions. Reserve some of the water.

recipeInstructions.text: In the pan with the oil, add sliced/chopped veggies. We used sliced red and green bell peppers and a few cherry tomatoes. Cook on medium till the veggies are half done.( 3-4 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: In the pan with the oil, add sliced/chopped veggies. We used sliced red and green bell peppers and a few cherry tomatoes. Cook on medium till the veggies are half done.( 3-4 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: For Oil-free version, saute the veggies in water or vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: For Oil-free version, saute the veggies in water or vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pasta and cashew cream, mix well and cook on low until the cream starts to bubble and thicken.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pasta and cashew cream, mix well and cook on low until the cream starts to bubble and thicken.

recipeInstructions.text: The cream will start thickening very quickly after this point.
recipeInstructions.name: The cream will start thickening very quickly after this point.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spices. Add a few Tablespoons of the pasta water to adjust sauce if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spices. Add a few Tablespoons of the pasta water to adjust sauce if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with halved cherry tomatoes, some dried basil and nutritional yeast sprinkle.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with halved cherry tomatoes, some dried basil and nutritional yeast sprinkle.
